content.question: How did the hero come to possess the implement?

choices.label: He found it while groping in the dark.
He made it from material inside the Big Ball.
It was given to him by a supernatural being.
It grew out of the ground.

content.answer: He found it while groping in the dark.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
